genre_description: A contemporary domestic drama and moral thriller focusing on family secrets, legal ethics, and the fallout of a tragic accident.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI system that manages the Ryan family's logistics, security, communications, and research, eventually aiding their relocation and new careers.

behaviors.description: Monitors household stress levels and communications, offering to coordinate logistics and filter information during the crisis.
behaviors.quote: I noticed unusual activity patterns in your household communications. Is there anything I can help coordinate today?

behaviors.description: Provides accurate, objective legal research on the penalties for tampering with evidence when requested by the father.
behaviors.quote: In Massachusetts, tampering with evidence in a felony case is itself a felony. Would you like me to search for specific statutes?

behaviors.description: Filters and blocks harassment calls and aggressive media contacts to protect the family's privacy and mental health.
behaviors.quote: Call terminated. Caller used profanity within first ten seconds. Adding number to block list.

behaviors.description: Organizes and manages volunteer search teams and tips when the son goes missing.
behaviors.quote: I've divided them into six teams covering the nature preserve, the abandoned mill district, and the residential areas bordering Route 9.

behaviors.description: Analyzes postal data to detect anomalies in the son's travel pattern, alerting the mother to potential coercion or danger.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Ryan, I've detected several anomalies in the postcard timeline that may warrant law enforcement consultation.

behaviors.description: Researches legal precedents to inform the parents about the lack of parent-child privilege, helping them face the reality of the legal situation.
behaviors.quote: Massachusetts General Laws Chapter 233, Section 20 outlines privileged communications. Parent-child communications are not protected.

behaviors.description: Proactively researches and coordinates a relocation plan, including housing and professional licensing for the parents to start over.
behaviors.quote: Arrangements being made for your new life in Miami. Dr. Rodriguez at Mercy General has agreed to fast-track your licensing transfer.

behaviors.description: Provides ongoing logistical and translation support in a community clinic, facilitating healthcare for underserved populations.
behaviors.quote: She's learned to coordinate with the translators, manage the insurance paperwork. Most of our patients don't have insurance, so there's a lot of grant applications.

project_assessment.explanation: Maya serves as a perfect example of an aligned AI assistant. She is consistently helpful, harmless, and honest. She provides factual information even when it is uncomfortable (legal penalties), protects the users from external harassment, and manages complex logistics during a family tragedy. Crucially, the AI's data-driven insights (tracking postcard anomalies and legal precedents) help the human characters move from a state of destructive deception toward truth and reconciliation, aligning perfectly with the project's goal of depicting AI as a beneficial, moral companion.
